circTest
  • Reference

Reference version 1.0

Main functions

all_permutations

All permutations used to compute the exact distributions of circular tests

compute_Sk

Compute spacing frequencies

circular_test

Two sample Test of Homogeneity

get_critical_values

Compute critical values for circular tests

Test statistic functions

dixon

Dixon test statistic based on spacing frequencies

rao

Rao test statistic based on spacing frequencies

savage

Savage test statistic based on spacing frequencies

van.der.Waerden

van der Waerden test statistic based on spacing frequencies

wheeler_watson

Wheeler-Watson test statistic based on spacing frequencies

wilcoxon

Wilcoxon test statistic based on spacing frequencies

Datasets

pigeons

Homing pigeons dataset

Internal functions

MC_pvalue

Monte-carlo simulation function to compute pvalues

get_bracket

Compute Bracketing Values
